metadata.description: Heroes in a half-shell for all ages! Representing the three-issue mini-series that adapted the first five episodes of the original animated TMNT series! Featuring the origins of the Turtles, Splinter, Bebop and Rocksteady... and the first Archie appearances of Shredder and the Foot Clan!
metadata.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Archie 100-Page Spectacular
